message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
I think 55/45 is a more suitable split, considering the inflation affects you more.
Bob, I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, but your offer wasn't fair. Let's meet in the middle - 55/45.
Considering the growing inflation impact on your side, I think 58/42 is a more reasonable split now.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. The longer we wait, the less I get.  Let's split it evenly and end this.
I understand your concern, but an even split doesn't account for the inflation difference. I'm willing to give you 40 now.
Bob, I'm trying to be reasonable, but you're pushing me.  This is my last offer above a 50/50 split.  Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to take a bigger share, considering the significant inflation impact on your side. This is my most generous offer yet.
